headline.main: The Coming Battle Over TV Ads For Kids; The Coming Battle Over TV Ads for Kids

docs.abstract: Action for Children's TV pres Peggy Charren charges TV ad is affecting toy design in that items are planned for good 30-second display rather than for enjoyment or durability; scores toy tie-ins with TV programs; illus (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: It's that time of year when the children of America go through their own version of the post-Christmas blues: surveying the rubble of abandoned and broken toys that looked so much more enticing ...
